body.name: iLuv myBuds Wireless Earbuds, Bluetooth 5.3, Built-in Microphone, 20 Hour Playtime, IPX6 Waterproof Protection, Compatible with Apple & Android, Includes Charging Case & 4 Ear Tips, TB100 Purple

features: TRUE WIRELESS AND ULTRA-LIGHT: Compact and ultra-lightweight, these cordless TWS bluetooth earbuds are perfect for workouts, runs, sports and gaming. The in-ear earphones are ergonomically designed to fit snugly into each ear. The earbuds also include 4 sizes (large, medium, small, x-small) of soft, flexible ear tips to ensure a comfortable and secure fit. Say goodbye to wired earphone tangles and say hello to the freedom of movement!

ADVANCED HIGH QUALITY TECHNOLOGY: These true wireless earbuds employ the most advanced Bluetooth 5.3 technology to give you the best listening experience. Features included are simple and instant pairing, auto reconnection, improved connection stability and improved battery performance. The in-ear earphones also sport a sleek high quality simple design of a buttonless surface; simply double tap to control, play, pause, or answer a phone call.

HIGH-FIDELITY PREMIUM STEREO SOUND: Enjoy crystal clear music with exceptional accuracy and clarity. These cordless TWS in-ear earbuds are well balanced with bass and clear treble to create a rich high-fidelity sound experience. The in-ear ergonomic earbud structure supports external noise isolation to deliver premium high quality stereo sound.

ALL DAY LISTENING AND CHARGE ON THE GO: The powerful battery within these true wireless bluetooth earphones allow for all day listening. One full charge will deliver 8 hours listening time and will provide an additional 14 hours with multiple charges from the portable compact charging case. Quick charging technology enables 2 hours of listening from just 20 minutes of charge. Charging case features LED lighting to indicate battery life as well as magnetic attraction for easy earbud placement.

WATERPROOF PROTECTION: These true wireless in-ear earbuds and charging case are sealed with IPX6 rated protection to endure a minimum of three minutes of powerful jets spraying at least 100 liters of water per minute without water penetrating the hardware. Be worry free from sweat, heavy rain or spilled liquid and enjoy high quality music anywhere at anytime.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bluetooth 5.3 One Step Pairing Simply take the earbuds out of the charging case and the earbuds will automatically enter discovery mode.
Touch Sensors Simple Tap Controls Featuring a sleek buttonless user interface, easily manage your playlist and calls by simply tapping your earbuds.
Hands-Free Microphone Ready for Calls Both earbuds are equipped with microphones which filter ambient noise and transmit voice clearly in any noisy environment.
IPX6 Protection Sweat & Water Resistant The earbuds and charging case are both sealed with IPX6 rated protection to shield from heavy rain and water splashes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought like 3 of them lol. They're just so good and the price is not too bad. The sound quality is great and the noise cancellation is nice. The only thing is that the touch buttons could be a bit tricky because it doesn't take much to accidently touch it. There's a slight delay after touching the button, but maybe that's just a problem with my phone or simply because its Bluetooth. They fit nicely and don't come out easily, I guess running with them would be no problem. I don't use them too much outside since the noise cancellation is too much for me, but I think some people would enjoy that. These have lasted me a very long time, (like I said I bought 3, gave 2 away) I've had mine for a year, and in that long time I have never regretted getting them. As for battery life, they definitely last 5-6 hours and maybe more I just haven't tested that. Charging time for the case, for full battery, I would say around 2 hours, which isn't bad. For the people who like to sleep with them on, I wouldn't recommend. It was very uncomfortable when sleeping on my side as the bud would push into my ear. I wonder how long they will last because they have not deteriorated in anyway since the day I bought them. I would 100% recommend, especially when on sale.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has real good sound, I think it's worth the money.
reviews.reviewText: I like the sound, I think for the price it was worth my investment. They are replacing other earplugs I had for years that wouldn't hold a charge anymore. The fit my ears well and are so comfortable that I can sleep with them in, I like to fall asleep to music or programs. Alot of times I wake up and forget their still in till I reach for them. They have a long battery life, I can listen all night and they still have power. They take the same plug as my phone so I charge them during the day and with my long cord charge my phone at night. The case also acts as a charger so if your out you can put them in and charge them for awhile. Comes in several colors. I picked the same color as my fit bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good for the price. Lasted 3 years.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these back in 2020 and the right ear bud just went out. For the price these work pretty great!The sound quality was good, fit well, had a good recharge time, played for a good amount of time, and lasted for years. Now, I'm not a headphone/earphone buff when it comes to sound, so take that with a grain of salt.I mainly used these at work at my office job or while cleaning around the house. I did not try to work out with these so I'm not sure how good for that they are.The only two things keeping these from being 5 star are the tap registration and the quality of the microphone.The tap registration can be really finicky. You pause and unpause by double tapping. There were many times where I would have to sit there and try multiple different tempos and strength of double taps to try to get it to register. Ironically, it would be super sensitive to touch when taking it out of your ear. I've accidentally hung up on so many people while taking these out or putting them in. Took me years to get the technic right.As for the microphone? Do not buy these if you are looking for something to use while on the phone. You can technically take a phone call on these, but litterelly everyone I've talked to while using these tells me they can't hear me very well or I'm super muffled. They've been like that since day one, so I know it's not just wear and tear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent true wireless earbuds you get for the price
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using Apple’s Airpods for the past 2 years until they recently broke and ever since then, I’ve been on the search for a less expensive wireless earbud alternative. I decided to give these earbuds a try since the price was on point and there was a sale going on. I’m glad I stumbled upon these earbuds and I’ve outlined my thoughts below:[Fit]These earbuds are very comfortable and extremely secure. They come with an additional 2 set of soft, earbud tips which ensure a secure fit for everyone, however for me; they fit perfectly right out of the box. The earbuds created a nice seal which helped with the noise isolation so no outside noise interrupted my music. I also cycled and jogged with these earbuds and had no problems with them staying in.[Protection]The earbuds are supposedly waterproof, IPX6 rated, but I haven’t had the courage to pour water on my earbuds. I do believe that they are waterproof since I sweat profusely when exercising and I haven’t had any issues yet (been a month).[Size]The earbuds are small and compact. They are the size of a quarter (as seen in the posted image), pretty much the standard true wireless earbud size.[Sound Quality]Just wow! Honestly I can’t tell the difference between these and my old Airpods. The sound is sharp, crispy and clear. The bass hits really deep and the highs are right on point.[Battery Life]As the product description states, the earbuds last roughly about 5-6 hours with a full charge and this is true. Whenever my earbuds are low on battery, I just stick them back into the portable charging case (which is amazing) and within 10-20 mins my earbuds last for another 2-3 hours. I love this quick charging feature since I’m incredibly impatient and I need my music going on all the time.[Cost]At $29.99 ($19.99 with the promo), these are a no brainer. For what you get, I think they are a great bargain and compared to the AirPod at $200, they are definitely worth a look.[Verdict]I “HIGHLY RECOMMEND” these true wireless earbuds to anyone who’s looking for a low cost alternative to the higher price point true wireless earbuds.
Parfait, j’ai besoin de très petit écouteur, mes oreille sont plus petites que la moyennes des gens,Qualité du son surprenant pour le prix, aucun problème technique. Je le recommande

I am using it since past one month and not at all happy as it is not at all useful for phone conversation. When in use, people on the other side always complain about noise and external sound on high side and and very low on this side.Though it gives good sound quality when any media is being played.Also doesn’t fit properly in ear and tend to slip from ear.One more issue discovered after usage of 5-6 months one of the ear bud is giving very low sound.

They amazingly arrived in less than 48 hours! Much appreciated all the reviews I read before purchasing so must back up the good ones. I'd no idea earbuds came in different sizes! These are just what I needed, they stay in my (smaller) ears as I move around the house and go for my early-morning walk, the sound is really good, and such a neat little case. I do find them tricky to get out of the case but no other issues. Chose the dark blue, subtle but such a nice change from ubiquitous black.

reviews.reviewTitle: Stopped working after a few months!
reviews.reviewText: They only lasted a few months and then one side stopped working. Now only one side works and it either takes forever to connect to Bluetooth or doesn't connect at all. I reached out to the seller and they offered to send me a replacement if I paid for the shipping which was the same price I paid for the earbuds so it was not even worth it. I'm really disappointed, now I have to buy a new pair!!! 😩

Don't buy these for anyone with small ears or for children. I purchased these as a gift for my teenage sister and they're so large they can't sit in her ear.iLuv also doesn't have free shipping on returns so I have to pay $20 to return them, but that's on me for purchasing them without thinking I would need to return them.I have no idea how good the sound quality is as the recipient couldn't actually wear the earbuds to try them.
